vsParam:
[px], thank you!
This thing you made for me is really a big help!

The medicine [px] made for me earlier
was very effective. It cured my cold! Thank you!

It's just a piece of cake!
Feel free to look for us anytime if you need help!

Why on earth would you work so hard
for other students?

I noticed that you'd undertake commissions indiscriminately...
Gathering ingredients is not a nice and easy job, is it?

Hmm. This is because...
everyone in the Academy is our "partner"!
They are just a bunch of strangers.
We all help each other here.

Home to everyone? I'm confused.
Everybody has his or her own family.

Oh, this is the so called "school spirit", huh?
Weird.

Ah, right! Mimi, come to the Academy and
be our "partner"!

In this way, you might be able
to understand what "partner" is.

... I reject. As an adventurer,
I don't need the Academy's care and support, and...

Because you are a
member of the Schwarzlang family?
I really want to be Mimi's "partner"...

D-don't get upset!
You are acting as if I made a mistake!

Gee, I can't bear it... I see! You want to play house
by acting as "partners", I'll play with you!

Really!? That's so great, [px]!
Mimi is also our "partner"!

I-it's only for playing house!
Listen, a real partner is...

Oh...
What was Mimi trying to say?

Hmm...
Maybe Mimi takes the word partner very seriously.

Perhaps this has something to do with
her eagerness to burnish her family name...

I see... I hope that Mimi can truly become
a "partner" in the Academy one day...
